userContentVulnerabilities.description: User content with raw filter - citizen data XSS vulnerability

recommendations.title: Fix Critical XSS Vulnerabilities
recommendations.description: Remove |raw filters from user content contexts immediately
recommendations.impact: Swiss government compliance violation - citizen data at risk
recommendations.action: Replace |raw filters with proper escaping or sanitization

recommendations.title: Secure User Content Rendering
recommendations.description: Implement proper escaping for all user-generated content
recommendations.impact: Citizen data protection and municipal portal security
recommendations.action: Use Twig auto-escaping, validate and sanitize user input

recommendations.title: Implement Comprehensive XSS Prevention
recommendations.description: Address high-risk XSS patterns in templates and scripts
recommendations.action: Replace unsafe patterns, implement CSP headers

recommendations.title: Implement Security Headers
recommendations.description: Add Content Security Policy and XSS protection headers
recommendations.impact: Enhanced XSS protection for municipal portals

recommendations.title: Enhance Input Validation
recommendations.description: Implement server-side input validation and sanitization
recommendations.impact: Citizen data protection and form security
recommendations.action: Add input validation, CSRF protection, sanitization filters

recommendations.title: Implement XSS Monitoring
recommendations.description: Set up automated XSS vulnerability monitoring
recommendations.impact: Ongoing security maintenance for government portals
recommendations.action: Schedule regular scans, implement security monitoring

nextSteps: Train development team on XSS prevention
